```{r}
tmp <- seq(3,6,by=0.1)
t <- exp(tmp)*cos(tmp)
t
```

```{r}
plot(t,type="l",col="blue")
points(exp(tmp),col="red")
points(cos(tmp),col="green")
```
```{r}
set.seed(50)
xVec <- sample(0:999, 250, replace=T)
yVec <- sample(0:999, 250, replace=T)

t <- yVec[-1] - xVec[-length(xVec)]

head(t,20)



```
